mapper.select: SELECT * FROM production_plan p JOIN ( SELECT d.production_plan_no, d.production_detail_no, d.product_code, d.plan_quantity, d.unit, d.other, d.progress_situation FROM ( SELECT d.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY d.production_plan_no ORDER BY d.production_detail_no ASC) AS rn FROM production_plan_detail d ) d WHERE d.rn = 1 ) d ON p.production_plan_no = d.production_plan_no
